TopicTitle: How do i make it withstand a collsion?

Articles.Content:
I\'m try to mod some parts so that they can withstand a hefty collsion and not separate/blow up...

Anyone know what part of the config file controls that?

CrashTolerance parameter determines part\'s resistance to collision, while breakingForce and breakingTorque define how strong is the part\'s attachment to other ones. 1e37 seems to be the maximum allowed value for these parameters.

That\'s not enough. The part (its node_collider mesh, to be exact) must be big enough and must be placed around (0, 0, 0) point. If that point ever touches the ground (or some other object) the part explodes no matter how large crashTolerance is.

I\'ve found that node_collider which is 1 meter in diameter resists a fall from 150 m at Kerbin and from 500 m at Mun.
